Summary Note:
Cristina Andrea Martínez and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Cristina Andrea Martínez is a 47 year old and comes from Spain.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Cristina Andrea Martínez has been happily married to Jiménez since 2009. They are proud parents of 2 children: Ruiz and Jiménez.
Education Background:
In 1997, Cristina finished her secondary school education at Instituto de Bachillerato Artístico IES Reina Sofia Tenerife.
Cristina earned her degree from IE University in 2001.
Additionally, she went on to study at University of Barcelona until 2006.
Occupation History:
Cristina Andrea Martínez is a 47 year old Angel Investor from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Cristina Andrea Martínez launched her career as a Stockbroker at BlackRock Hispanic Markets S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2002 to 2004.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Portfolio Manager at The Vanguard Group Inc. in 2006, further expanding her skill set.
From 2008 to 2012, she served as a Hedge Fund Manager at BlackRock Hispanic Markets S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
After 10 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Private Equity Investor at BlackRock Hispanic Markets S.A. in 2013, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
As a Angel Investor at The Vanguard Group Inc. since 2019, she remains committed to excellence, driving progress and inspiring others through her remarkable leadership.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 330000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has villa located in San Sebastián, worth 2530000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns villa in Murcia worth 2080000 EUR.

She inherited 480000 EUR from her mother, a well-known Stock Trader, in 2005, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting her in achieving her financial goals.
